card.property: Etrata, the Silencer can't be blocked. Whenever Etrata deals combat damage to a player, exile target creature that player controls and put a hit counter on that card. That player loses the game if they own three or more exiled cards with hit counters on them. Etrata's owner shuffles Etrata into their library.

card.name: Firemind's Research
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a charge counter on Firemind's Research. {1}{U}, Remove two charge counters from Firemind's Research: Draw a card. {1}{R}, Remove five charge counters from Firemind's Research: It deals 5 damage to any target.

card.name: Garrison Sergeant
card.property: Garrison Sergeant has double strike as long as you control a Gate.

card.name: Glowspore Shaman
card.property: When Glowspore Shaman enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a land card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Goblin Electromancer
card.property: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Golgari Findbroker
card.property: When Golgari Findbroker enters the battlefield, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Hammer Dropper
card.property: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

card.name: House Guildmage
Hypothesizzle
card.property: Draw two cards. Then you may discard a nonland card. When you do, Hypothesizzle deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Ionize
card.property: Counter target spell. Ionize deals 2 damage to that spell's controller.

card.name: Izoni, Thousand-Eyed
card.property: Undergrowth — When Izoni, Thousand-Eyed enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black and green Insect creature token for each creature card in your graveyard. {B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

card.name: Join Shields
card.property: Untap all creatures you control. They gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

card.name: Justice Strike
card.property: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

card.name: Knight of Autumn
card.property: When Knight of Autumn enters the battlefield, choose one — • Put two +1/+1 counters on Knight of Autumn. • Destroy target artifact or enchantment. • You gain 4 life.

card.name: Lazav, the Multifarious
card.property: When Lazav, the Multifarious enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) {X}: Lazav, the Multifarious becomes a copy of target creature card in your graveyard with mana value X, except its name is Lazav, the Multifarious, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has this ability.

card.name: League Guildmage
Ledev Champion
card.property: Whenever Ledev Champion attacks, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Ledev Champion gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature tapped this way. {3}{G}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

card.name: Legion Guildmage
March of the Multitudes
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink.

card.name: Mnemonic Betrayal
card.property: Exile all opponents' graveyards. You may cast spells from among those cards this turn, and mana of any type can be spent to cast them. At the beginning of the next end step, if any of those cards remain exiled, return them to their owners' graveyards. Exile Mnemonic Betrayal.

card.name: Molderhulk
card.property: Undergrowth — This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard. When Molderhulk enters the battlefield, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Nightveil Predator
card.property: Flying, deathtouch Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Niv-Mizzet, Parun
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, Parun deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, you draw a card.

card.name: Notion Rain
card.property: Surveil 2, then draw two cards. Notion Rain deals 2 damage to you. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Ochran Assassin
card.property: Deathtouch All creatures able to block Ochran Assassin do so.

card.name: Ral, Izzet Viceroy
card.property: +1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard. −3: Ral, Izzet Viceroy deals damage to target creature equal to the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard. −8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, this emblem deals 4 damage to any target and you draw two cards."

card.name: Rhizome Lurcher

card.name: Sumala Woodshaper
card.property: When Sumala Woodshaper enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Swathcutter Giant

card.name: Thief of Sanity
card.property: Flying Whenever Thief of Sanity deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of that player's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest into their graveyard. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.

card.name: Thought Erasure
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Thousand-Year Storm
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it for each other instant and sorcery spell you've cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.

card.name: Trostani Discordant
card.property: Other creatures you control get +1/+1. When Trostani Discordant enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink. At the beginning of your end step, each player gains control of all creatures they own.

card.name: Truefire Captain
card.property: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Whenever Truefire Captain is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target player.

card.name: Undercity Uprising
card.property: Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn. Then target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Underrealm Lich
card.property: If you would draw a card, instead look at the top three cards of your library, then put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Pay 4 life: Underrealm Lich gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

card.name: Unmoored Ego
card.property: Choose a card name. Search target opponent's graveyard, hand, and library for up to four cards with that name and exile them. That player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

card.name: Assure // Assemble

alternate.name: Assure
alternate.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

alternate.name: Assemble
alternate.property: Create three 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature tokens with vigilance.

card.name: Connive // Concoct

alternate.name: Connive
alternate.property: Gain control of target creature with power 2 or less.

alternate.name: Concoct
alternate.property: Surveil 3, then return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Discovery // Dispersal

alternate.name: Discovery
alternate.property: Surveil 2, then draw a card. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

alternate.name: Dispersal
alternate.property: Each opponent returns a nonland permanent they control with the highest mana value among permanents they control to its owner's hand, then discards a card.

card.name: Expansion // Explosion

alternate.name: Expansion
alternate.property: Copy target instant or sorcery spell with mana value 4 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy.

alternate.name: Explosion
alternate.property: Explosion deals X damage to any target. Target player draws X cards.

card.name: Find // Finality

alternate.name: Find
alternate.property: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

alternate.name: Finality
alternate.property: You may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature you control. Then all creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Flower // Flourish

alternate.name: Flower
alternate.property: Search your library for a basic Forest or Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

alternate.name: Flourish
alternate.property: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Integrity // Intervention

alternate.name: Integrity
alternate.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

alternate.name: Intervention
alternate.property: Intervention deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Invert // Invent

alternate.name: Invert
alternate.property: Switch the power and toughness of each of up to two target creatures until end of turn.

alternate.name: Invent
alternate.property: Search your library for an instant card and/or a sorcery card, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Response // Resurgence

alternate.name: Response
alternate.property: Response deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

alternate.name: Resurgence
alternate.property: Creatures you control gain first strike and vigilance until end of turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Status // Statue

alternate.name: Status
alternate.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

alternate.name: Statue
alternate.property: Destroy target artifact, creature, or enchantment.
